Script.name: echoCom
Script.script: function echoCom() FEDGUI.chatwindow:echo("\n") FEDGUI.chatwindow:cecho('<ansiCyan>' .. gmcp.comm.com.from .. ' comms: "' .. gmcp.comm.com.message .. '"') end
